title: Meeting Notes: Project UMKMnet
content:
Discussion Summary:
- Deadline for MVP: May 10, 2025
- Backend using Express.js, Frontend with Bootstrap
- Features: Product Catalog, Order System, Admin Dashboard
- Assignments:
  * UI Design - Rina
  * Backend - Fajar
  * Testing - Budi

title: Shopping List
content:

title: Ideas for Portfolio Website
content:
To-do:
- Dark/light mode toggle
- Section: About Me, Skills, Projects, Contact
- Use animations with Framer Motion
- Responsive layout with Bootstrap Grid
- Contact form integration with EmailJS or custom backend endpoint

title: Exam Prep: Image Processing
content:
Key Topics:
- Histogram Equalization
- Filtering: Median, Gaussian, Mean
- Edge Detection: Sobel, Canny
- Morphological Operations: Dilation, Erosion

Practice with Python OpenCV before Friday!
